xychart-beta
    title "Monthly Revenue Trend"
    x-axis ["Point 1", "Point 3", "Point 5", "Point 7", "Point 9", "Point 11"]

description: Data extracted from user request for Monthly Revenue Trend showing an upward trend from 100.00 to 220.00
insights: Peak at Point 11 (220.00), lowest at Point 1 (100.00)
